name: ideas_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool trading_view.
Tool description: This API helps you to query for data which is obtained by professional providers who have direct and extensive access to stock quotes, futures, popular indices, Forex, Bitcoin and CFDs to create a financial community site/application, such as : tradingview.com
API description: Fetches a list of ideas/posts with various filtering and sorting options.

locale.description: The language code for the ideas/posts. Default is 'en'.

stock_country.description: The country code for stock-related ideas. Only applicable if the market is 'stock'. Default is 'us'.

page.description: The page index for pagination. Default is 1.

per_page.description: The number of items per page for pagination. Default is 20.

symbol.description: Filter ideas/posts related to the specified symbol (e.g., 'NASDAQ:AAPL').

sort.description: Sorting option. Options are 'latest_popular', 'recent', 'picked_time'. Default is 'latest_popular'.
